plot: Homer contemplates his next move after getting in the doghouse with Marge, while Millhouse's new Stanley Kowalski-inspired persona makes him suddenly attractive to Lisa.

Once more Homer's selfishness has antagonized Marge and his attempts to make things up with her consistently fail - until he resorts to buying sex toys, one of which injures him. They fail to impress her but she is pleased that he made the effort. Meanwhile, having watched 'A Streetcar Named Desire' Milhouse decides that the best way to court Lisa is to treat her mean though the façade eventually crumbles.—don @ minifie-1
